text: hey <@U02688JHZ> do we have a check-in with Ziba today?
yes!
i dont see it on my cal
I'm trying to get it scheduled
ah ok
they requested 3pm but Jason won't be able to start visual design until 2, so I'm trying to schedule it for 4 or 4;30
i'm pulling in a few things into a doc as a starting point
i have to say though - I don't think we're going to have meaningful designs even if it is a delayed meeting
we'll have SOMETHING, but it isn't going to be well considered beyond making wires look more like what they started visually
and i know that's frustrating given the unfortunate double booking, but want to set expectations
and again, i'm pulling a bunch of stuff in a doc as a starting point so we have it
but i don't know that there's going to be magic between 2-4 even at our best
fair enough, and I'll set expectations appropriately. thanks everyone!
So - in digging around in their files a bit, I'd like to propose the following for today:
1) We indeed do share as far as we get with visuals. I have a mock up of the opening screen done, we're going to get the battery page done too (at least a start)
2) We talk about wires specifically to start hammering out what we believe should be the proper things there

3) We go beyond just showing some visuals and point out that the work (which is true) we're doing visually is more about building foundational elements — Type sizes (theirs were pretty far off), grid structure, color, iconography.
that foundation is going to provide the jumping point for all things moving forward
and is doing the work we'll need to do in a structured way that isn't just visuals.
That sounds great. Thanks so much!
Thanks <@U0265G76F>
<!channel>: we're on for 4:30pm. I'll send an invite
cool. are they coming here?

for our 4:30
